authorId.description: Unique identifier of the Discord user

totalMessages.description: Total number of messages sent by the user

firstMessage.description: Timestamp of the user's first message

lastMessage.description: Timestamp of the user's most recent message

editedMessages.description: Number of messages that were edited by the user

attachmentsCount.description: Number of files or media attachments sent by the user

embedsCount.description: Number of rich embeds (links, images, etc.) in user's messages

mentionsSent.description: Number of times the user mentioned other users/roles

totalReactionsReceived.description: Total number of reactions received on user's messages

totalMessageLength.description: Total character count of all messages sent by the user

responseTimes.description: Array of response times in seconds between user's messages
